tile.text: You consider your possessions and what you could do without.

link.text: From your satchel you withdraw your newly forged bread knife and hand it over hilt first
From your satchel you withdraw the faded parchment and offer it to the merchant
From your satchel you withdraw your newly acquired shawl and display it for the shopkeeper
With a smile and a goodbye for the vendor you walk away from his stall
